text: Christina Lee "Christy" Hemme (born October 28, 1980) is an American ring announcer, professional wrestling valet, singer, former model and retired professional wrestler. She currently works for Total Nonstop Action Wrestling as an interviewer and ring announcer. She is also known for her time in World Wrestling Entertainment where she won the 2004 Diva Search. She stayed with them from 2004 to 2005 and was released from her WWE contract on December 5, 2005. She signed with Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA) in April 2006. ==Championships== *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **She was ranked #42 of the best 50 female singles wrestlers in the PWI Female 50 in 2008. *Total Nonstop Action Wrestling **Knockout of the Year (2006) *World Wrestling Entertainment **WWE Diva Search winner (2004) ==References== ==Other websites== * *TNA profile Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:American rock singers Category:Football players from California Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Christy Hemme
